title: War Pick
content:
War Pick Common 1~8 Damage 1d8 Piercing Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: A pickaxe modified to pierce flesh and armour rather than stone. War Pick 0.9 50

Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks:

A pickaxe modified to pierce flesh and armour rather than stone.

War Pick is one of the Martial Melee Weapons in Baldur's Gate 3. In BG3, each type of weapon has different ranges, damages, and other features (Finesse, Versatile, Dippable, etc). Characters need to master certain Proficiency
